upgradeInfo.itemName: Black Dragon: Foundation of Dark Power

options.explain:
Incoming Sleep casts the Insomnia buff instead of the Sleep effect for 60 sec.

Insomnia applies the following.
- Skill Atk. +4% for every 10% of Sleep Tolerance loss from 0%. (Tolerance added by armor, accessories, and Special Equipment only)
- Your Sleep-specific equipment effects are applied during Insomnia.
- Losing at least 1% of HP on hit wakes you up, decreasing Insomnia stacks -1.
- All speed -2% per Insomnia stack
- If 4 or more Insomnia stacks, attacks decrease them -2 at the cost of 30% of your remaining HP.

5 Insomnia stacks delete the Insomnia buff and increase Movement Speed +20% for 10 sec.
options.explainDetail:
Incoming Sleep casts the Insomnia buff instead of the Sleep effect for 60 sec.

Insomnia applies the following. (Max Stacks: 5)
- Skill Atk. +4% for every 10% of Sleep Tolerance loss from 0%. (Up to +28%. Tolerance added by armor, accessories, and Special Equipment only. Avatars, emblems, gems, Creatures, and titles included.)
- Your Sleep-specific equipment effects are applied during Insomnia. (HP healing effects excluded)
- Losing at least 1% of HP on hit wakes you up, decreasing Insomnia stacks -1. (Can't go below 1 if Childhood's Dream Stage equipment is equipped.)
- All speed -2% per Insomnia stack
- If 4 or more Insomnia stacks, attacks decrease them -2 at the cost of 30% of your remaining HP. (Cooldown: 30 sec.)

5 Insomnia stacks delete the Insomnia buff and increase Movement Speed +20% for 10 sec. (Max Stacks: 1)

options.explain:
Applies the following, depending on the enemy's Neutralize gauge.
- Over 50 to 90%: Skill Atk. +8%
- Over 20 to 50%: Skill Atk. +13%
- 20% or lower: Skill Atk. +20%
- This Skill Atk. bonus is reset when the enemy's Neutralize gauge is reactivated.
